definitions.definition: A false belief that is resistant to confrontation with actual facts.
The state of being deluded or misled , or process of deluding somebody.
examples: It is far better to grasp the universe as it really is than to persist in delusion , however satisfying and reassuring.

definitions.definition: That which is falsely or delusively believed or propagated; false belief; error in belief.
A fixed, false belief, that will not change, despite evidence to the contrary.

main_definition: A false belief that is resistant to confrontation with actual facts.
